Package com.dpsframework.util

Command-line, Common service classes and GUI-resources.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PsConstants
    Agents and Tools Project Constants.
    PsConstants.AgentINSTANCE
    Default instance Agent name.
    PsConstants.BoardPKEYS
    The 'board.properties' file and its Keys.
    PsConstants.FwARTIFACTS
    Default artifact name convention.
    PsConstants.FwCLASS
    Core Classes and Packages names used by 'dpsFramework'.
    PsConstants.FwDISTRIBUTION
    Framework Distribution values.
    PsConstants.FwPATHS
    dpsFramework Paths conventions.
    PsConstants.FwPKEYS
    The 'framework.properties' file and its Keys.
    PsConstants.JADEdefaults
    JADE Multiagent Platform defaults.
    PsConstants.KwBASED
    Knowledge-based Agents defaults.
    PsConstants.NodePKEYS
    The 'node.properties' file and its Keys.
    PsConstants.ToolPARAMETERS
    Tools: launcher, generate, shell and framework, the parameters of.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandLineReader
    This is a quick hack to turn empty lines entered interactively on the command line into ';\n' empty lines for the interpreter.
    JadeConsole
    A JFC/Swing Based Console for the BeanShell desktop.
    JadeConsole.BlockingPipedInputStream
    The overridden read method in this class will not throw "Broken pipe" IOExceptions; It will simply wait for new writers and data.
    PsFramework
    It builds new dpsFramework directory where stores and launches Agents.
    PsGenerate
    Genetare-Tool makes new agents directory-structure on /nodes/ directory.
    PsLauncher
    It analyzes and prepares JADE Boot launching about agents and collections.
    PsServices
    Main Repository of dpsFramwork Static Methods and Services.
    PsServices.DirFilter  
    PsShell
    It opens Shell-consoles to the user: Java interpreter.

Package com.dpsframework.util Description

Command-line, Common service classes and GUI-resources

.

Since:
2014, update at: 2018-07-15
Version:
1.7 (Build.1814)
Author:
Francisco J. Aguayo (Leon University / IEEE Power & Energy Systems Society Member)

Agent dpsFramework Project

+-------------------------------------+------------------------------------+
| Node    Board  Monitor  Stage       |    The dpsFramework Agents Project |
|           __             ____       |                                    |
|     __   /  \           /    \      + -----------------------------------|
|  __/  \  \__/      __  /      \                                          |
| /  \__/  /  \   __/  \ \      /                                          |
| \__/     \__/  /  \__/  \____/   dpsFramework is a standard directory on |
| /  \     /  \  \__/            file-system generated to launch groups of |
| \__/     \__/              JADE Agents which they can run Expert Systems |
|                           Applications based on CLIPS or Jess Technology.|
